applicant-name.name: 中国科学院大连化学物理研究所

invention-title: Preparation method of hydrogen peroxide based on barium circulation
一种基于钡循环的过氧化氢制备方法

abstract.p: The invention relates to a novel hydrogen peroxide preparation method which at least comprises the following steps: mixing a barium-based oxygen carrier with an aqueous solution containing carbon dioxide gas, and reacting to obtain an aqueous solution containing hydrogen peroxide and carbonate precipitate; and roasting the carbonate precipitate to obtain the barium-based oxygen carrier. Meanwhile, enrichment and conversion of low-concentration carbon dioxide gas are realized. According to the technology, the reaction raw materials are low in cost, the reaction process is environment-friendly, the obtained hydrogen peroxide is low in metal impurity content and high in hydrogen peroxide component content, enrichment and separation of low-concentration carbon dioxide gas can be achieved at the same time, heating devices based on the electric heating technology, the photo-thermal technology and the like can be effectively coupled, low-carbon and efficient hydrogen peroxide preparation is achieved, and industrial production is facilitated. And the method has a very wide application prospect. The equipment investment is small, the barium-based oxygen carrier can be recycled, no pollution gas or solid waste is discharged in the production process, and the process is green and environment-friendly.

本发明涉及一种新型的双氧水制备方法，至少包括以下步骤：将钡基氧载体与含有二氧化碳气体的水溶液混合，反应，得到含有过氧化氢的水溶液和碳酸盐沉淀；碳酸盐沉淀焙烧，得到所述钡基氧载体。同时实现低浓度二氧化碳气体的富集和转化。本技术反应原料成本低廉，反应过程环保，所得双氧水金属杂质含量低、过氧化氢组分含量高，可同时实现低浓度二氧化碳气体的富集和分离，并能有效耦合基于电热、光热等技术的加热装置，实现低碳、高效双氧水制备，具有非常广阔的应用前景。设备投资小，且钡基氧载体可循环使用，生产过程无污染气体或固废的排放，工艺绿色环保。
